sentences.en: Is the word'psychosis'part of your idiolect?
sentences.cn: 在你的个人言语中使用psychosis这个词 吗 ?

sentences.en: Such a personal dialect is referred to as idiolect.
sentences.cn: 这样的个人方言就叫作个人习语。

sentences.en: This paper deals with the relevance of idiolect to translation.
sentences.cn: 本文论述了个人习语与翻译两者之间的关系。

trans.tran_cn: 个人语型，个人言语方式
trans.tran_en: the way in which a particular person uses language
